reasoning: There is a verified 404 error due to RequireJS path misconfiguration - the JavaScript module cannot load because RequireJS is looking for the file at an incorrect path. This is a real configuration bug that prevents the AccountSettings module from functioning.
evidence_summary: Screenshots show the Accounts panel fails to open when clicked. The test confirmed the HTML file exists (HTTP 200) but RequireJS returns 404 because it looks for 'scripts/Modules/Evoq.Accounts/Scripts/AccountSettings.js' while the actual path is 'Modules/Evoq.Accounts/scripts/AccountSettings.js'. This path mismatch is a genuine configuration error preventing the module JavaScript from loading.
scenario_id: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings::Module UI Loading::Verify HTML template loads without errors
